name: twilio
description: Guidance for Twilio .NET SDK for communications APIs. USE FOR: sending SMS and MMS, making voice calls, Twilio Verify for phone verification, WhatsApp messaging, webhook handling for incoming messages/calls, Twilio programmable video. DO NOT USE FOR: email sending (use mimekit), HTTP APIs (use ASP.NET Core), gRPC services (use grpc-dotnet), custom socket protocols (use dotnetty).
author: Tyler-R-Kendrick
